sentence: The image is a two-panel comic strip featuring cartoon fish characters.
sentence_cn: 该图像是一幅双联漫画，其中有卡通鱼人物。

sentence: - Two fish are depicted swimming in a flooded area of what seems to be Canada, indicated by a submerged sign with "Canada" partially visible.
sentence_cn: - 图中描绘了两条鱼在看似加拿大的洪水区域内游动，水下的标志牌上部分显示“加拿大”字样。

sentence: - The water is colored blue, and the background includes a building, partially underwater, to emphasize the flooding.
sentence_cn: - 水是蓝色的，背景包括一栋部分在水下的建筑物，以强调洪水。

sentence: - A speech bubble above asks, "What do you do when Canada's flooded?"
sentence_cn: - 上面的对话框询问“加拿大发生洪水时你会怎么做？”
words: What do you do when Canada's flooded?

sentence: - The same two fish are now on dry land, still in Canada, as the background features a grass and a partially visible sign.
sentence_cn: - 同样的两条鱼现在仍在加拿大的陆地上，背景是一片草地和一个部分可见的标志。

sentence: - One fish is holding a can of "Canada Dry," a reference to the brand of ginger ale.
sentence_cn: - 一条鱼拿着一罐“Canada Dry”，这是姜汁汽水的品牌。

sentence: - The other fish, looking surprised, has a speech bubble saying, "Hey, the water is going away..."
sentence_cn: - 另一条鱼看起来很惊讶，上面有一个对话框说：“嘿，水正在消失......”
words: Hey, the water is going away...

sentence: - The text above reads, "You drink CANADA DRY..."
sentence_cn: - 上面的文字写着“你喝的是 CANADA DRY……”

sentence: The comic humorously links the name of the soft drink "Canada Dry" to the phrase about drinking all the floodwater to make it dry.
sentence_cn: 漫画幽默地将这种饮料的名字“Canada Dry”与喝光所有洪水以使洪水干涸的短语联系起来。
